name: Outsource Expo
overview:
Intelligent Solutions for the Outsourcing Industry

UPDATED 3/10/2012

Onshore, nearshore, and offshore professionals, OutsourceExpo will serve as a destination site to connect people with all things outsourcing in new and smart ways; businesses looking for freelancers, virtual staffing, freelancers/ICs looking for work, outsource/BPO vendor services, industry experts, and a wide range of next-gen services typically detached from the outsource industry yet critical for entrepreneur and early stage business growth. Not only will OutsourceExpo allow for the relationship connections, it will also provide the software to automate the services and communication.

Launch date scheduled for mid Q2, 2012.
